venue.name: Bear and Grill Restaurants in Orange

item.description:
Hi! This is just to let everyone know that I will be playing during happy hour at the Bear and Grill Restuarant in Orange on Friday, August 24th from 5:30 to 7:30 PM. It is ALWAYS great to have some familiar faces in the crowd. If you could stop by - even for a little while - it would be greatly appreciated. As this is a public venue, feel free t o bring friends, family or co-workers to enjoy the music, etc.    – the more, the merrier! 

 

ABOUT Tom Ferrara: Tom is a member of Party Express! and will be your event host. Tom performs a classic selection of acoustic folk and mellow rock that includes a varied mix of artists from James Taylor, Jim Croce and The Beatles to Green Day, Dave Matthews and Collective Soul. Tom has performed at a a number of happy hours, open mic nights, private parties, benefits and festivals. For more, check out Tom at: http://www.facebook.com/TheCaptainRocks. 

ABOUT Bear and Grill: Bear & Grill offers a casual American menu with regional specials, with most items including desserts and breads made frsh daily. Decor and ambiance is fun and casual.  It evokes images of a bygone era of the great camps and lodges of the Adirondacks, complete with a floor-to-ceiling stone fireplace, split logs and twigs, massive antler chandeliers, camping memorabilia, and our own Log Cabin bar. You can find out more about the Bear and Grill by visitng their Facebook page at: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Bear-Grill-Orange/135620547731, or by visiting their website at: http://www.bearandgrill.com/orange%20website/index_inside.html.
